attributes.action: Change the voting system to better reflect voters giving fairer representation.
attributes.additional_details:
Democracy is meant to be for all but the current system is unnecessarily partisan. Issues tend to be complex so why do we have such a binary voting system that no longer reflects the UK?

Changes also need to be made to the ways in which we can vote and how we register to vote.
attributes.background: Voter turnout has been steadily falling over decades. Whilst registration improved for the EU referendum, it seems some people may have used this as a protest vote against the government. It seems logical that a voting system that better reflects voters wishes can only improve democracy for all.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you would like to see to the voting system.
